mapper.update: update act_ru_task set REV_=1,ASSIGNEE_=#{approvedPerson} where ID_=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from act_ru_task where to_days(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(CREATE_TIME_) <= #{count};
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( CREATE_TIME_, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS days, count( 1 ) AS counts FROM act_ru_task GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( CREATE_TIME_, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME_ ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT substring( NAME_, 3 ) days, count( 1 ) AS counts FROM act_ru_task GROUP BY NAME_

SELECT ID_ procdefId, VERSION_ version, NAME_ name, KEY_ keyName, RESOURCE_NAME_ resourceName, DEPLOYMENT_ID_ deploymentId, SUSPENSION_STATE_ status FROM act_re_procdef
NAME_ like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and KEY_ like CONCAT('%', #{keyName}, '%')
mapper.update: update act_re_procdef set SUSPENSION_STATE_=#{status} where ID_=#{procdefId}
